channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Snapped bollard Edinburgh place outside the shops, 8th July
item.description:
Three of them have gone now making ready access onto the pavement can somebody come and sort it out please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coronation Square Market Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road, 8th July
item.description:
Many potholes are appearing in Snowdon gardens now,could do with patching also the gutters are full of weeds could do with clearing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 75 Snowdon Gardens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road vehicle damage to footpath, 8th July
item.description:
Two potential ankle twisting, or child falling off bike bits of damage on the footpath on Roman Hackle Avenue opposite Limber Hill. Obviously done by a road vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Arkle Close, Wymans Brook
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The ‘brown’ tourist information signs, are now a disgusting faded green., 8th July
item.description:
The Tourist information signs, which I believe started off as brown, are now a very faded, almost illegible pale green. Not very encouraging.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked water stop cover on pavement., 8th July
item.description:
Has cracked in two and can split and fall into the recess. This creates a significant hazard to pedestrians. The cover is for number 11.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Rivelands Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drop curb required for wheelchair immobility access on the footpath that crosses Dunster Grove, 8th July
item.description:
Drop curb required for wheelchair immobility access on the footpath that crosses Dunster Grove. For mobility scooter access It would be good to have someone consider this footpath and allowing access for wheelchairs and mobility scooters on an aging estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drop curb and removal of barriers For mobility scooter access top of Springbank Road, 8th July
item.description:
For mobility scooter access top of Springbank Road It would be good to have someone consider this footpath and allowing access for wheelchairs and ability scooters on an aging estate

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass shards on road, 7th July
item.description:
Broken glass on road. Could easily puncture car or bicycle tyres.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77 Rosehill Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge jutting into the lane, 7th July
item.description:
Extensive hedge needs trimming as it is overhanging, scratching cars and is dangerous to the many pedestrians who use this lane for recreation and dog walking
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Oakland Sunnyfield Lane, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous potholes, 7th July
item.description:
Driving along Pittville Circus Road towards Hewlett Rd my front left wheel fell into a pothole causing the car to be pushed towards park cars fortunately I managed to regain control before I hit a parked cars- fortunately there were no pedestrians otherwise it could of been very serious. The state of this road is dangerous to cyclists, pedestrians and motorists urgent action is required to prevent injury and damage. It is a known issue which needs immediate attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nettles and brambles need cutting soon., 6th July
item.description:
The footpath along the side of the railway from Swindon Lane towards Wymans Brook (the waterway) needs a trim before it becomes impassable please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Pendil Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in the alley and surrounds, 6th July
item.description:
Large number of black bags outside a property on Swindon Street - with more in the lane behind the property.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Swindon Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights completely out, at 7:30pm today, 5th July
item.description:
No traffic signals, none were working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars contiuously blocking cycle lane, 4th July
item.description:
The cycle lane here is nearly always blocked by illegally parked cars. Cyclists have to drive around the bollards into the path of cars emerging from Henrietta Street. Maybe a camera to catch all offending vehicles and fine them? Clearly the double yellow lines are no deterrant. It is an accident waiting to happen as cars and commercial vehicles come around that blind corner quite fast.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 276 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ridiculous high trees, taller by 50% than the houses in canning road,, 3rd July
item.description:
I have been reporting this issue for years and nothing is done, all of these trees have ash die back and should be removed, I am fed up of collecting up 4-5ft long branches from my garden, if one hit me would they then be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Canning Road, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All headgear over grown obstructing the paths down to the newly opened bridge.., 3rd July
item.description:
All hedges so overgrown, now making the footpaths unsafe to use. Hedges now blocking road signage, growing over the road edging stones. Also lots of old sign frames still un collected. In some areas you can’t see oncoming vehicles where verges are so overgrown. Needs urgent attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Cotswold Court Park Old Gloucester Road, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedges on Lansdown Road, 3rd July
item.description:
The hedges along Lansdown Road, and particularly near Westal Green, are spilling onto the footpath and forcing pedestrians to walk in the cycle path at the risk of being knocked over by speeding cyclists. I suspect you may be waiting for fledglings to leave the nests but thought I’d check whether there are plans to cut back the hedges soon? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Regent House Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brambles over growing footpath, 3rd July
item.description:
These are right a face height for the children walking to school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Rippledale Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bush blocking path, 3rd July
item.description:
It looks as though someone has had a new fence put in and in order to do that they have chopped down ivy and dumped it in the footpath used by the Lakeside Primary kids each day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Hazebrouck Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes CT on. Cherry avenue, 3rd July
item.description:
Potholes. Problem for cyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Cherry Avenue, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet
